comment: Wonderful Kentucky Bourbon smooth with nice flavor. My go to bourbon!

Almonds, berries, and peaches on the nose; surprisingly fruity with pretty prominent blackberries, raspberries, black cherry, and dark oak—surprisingly fruity in a very dark, woody way; smooth af and smooth texture; cherry and oak finish
Inviting nose, lots of caramel at first with brown sugar and oak. Warm, Round taste on the palate. Lots of Caramel, brown sugar and a cherry finish. Fruit notes linger on the palate.
Beautiful wood note with an almost black cherry note with a smooth finish
Sweet and smooth with oak and vanilla finish
Aroma of brown sugar, not terribly Woody or dry
Oak. Lots of oak. Huge citrus nose with a very subtle maple finish.
